item.title: IDE
item.description: JetBrains IntelliJ: Java的IDE, 安装Python的插件也支持python. PyCharm: Python的IDE. Goland: golang的IDE. https://github.com/JetBrains/intellij-community https://github.com/judasn/IntelliJ-IDEA-Tutorial pycharm https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/631-python pycharm plugin for intellij. database https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/1800-database-navigator https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/CONTEST/Database+Navigator oracle/mysql/postgresql/sqlite plugin. vim
